A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Aside from beautiful visual effects\, this film has nothing else to offer. It has butchered its source material\, disrespected the once well-established characters and ruined its potential with extreme inconsistency throughout the film. Many plot points don't make sense\, characters have no arc and development. This film is littered with plot armor\, plotholes\, and forced jokes that divided audience and broke the fan's heart.
